actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that, in the case of the payment of more than one monthly benefit under such title to the same individual for the same month, the final rounding of benefits before payment shall apply to the total amount of the benefits so paid.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to provide that when more than one monthly OASDI benefit is paid to an individual, the rounding of benefits before payment shall apply to the total amount of such benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that, in the case of the payment of more than one monthly benefit under such title to the same individual for the same month, the final rounding of benefits before payment shall apply to the total amount of the benefits so paid.
